members.name: variant
members.description:
The variant of the busy indicator.
- `spinner` (default): displays a spinner.
- `progress`: displays a progress bar.
- `message-only`: No progress indicator is displayed.

members.name: determinate
members.description: Indicates whether the loading indicator is determinate.

members.name: progress
members.description: The progress amount for the progress bar.

members.name: buffer
members.description: The buffer amount for the progress bar.

members.name: transparent
members.description: Indicates whether the busy indicator surface should be transparent (no background or elevation).
